Uses of Class
irtrusbot.IrcMessage

    • Uses of IrcMessage in irtrusbot

      Fields in irtrusbot declared as IrcMessage 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      IrcMessage IrcEvent.message
      Field for a sent or received IRC Message (PRIVMSG) object, for CHAT type events - This is 'null' for inapplicable events.
      Methods in irtrusbot that return IrcMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IrcMessage IrcMessage.getReply(IrcOrigin replyfrom, String replytext, boolean direct)
      Generates an IRC Message in the form of a reply to given message.
      Methods in irtrusbot with parameters of type IrcMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IrcBot.process_message(IrcMessage im)
      Processes an IRC PRIVMSG [chat message] command This function dispatches a CHAT (direction=RECEIVING) message to plugins Any additional processing can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages (NOTE: none implemented at this time)
      void IrcBot.sendMessage(IrcMessage im)
      Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] defined by an IrcMessage object.
      void IrcSession.sendMessage(IrcMessage im)
      Converts and sends an IRC Message object as a PRIVMSG to the server.
      void IrcBot.sendReply(IrcMessage im, String text, boolean direct)
      Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] in reply to a received IrcMessage This function also dispatches a CHAT and COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins.
      void IrcSession.sendReply(IrcMessage im, String text, boolean direct)
      Creates, Converts, and sends a reply message to an IRC Message object as a PRIVMSG to the server NOTE: this function assumes 'account' to be from/origin field of the reply sent.
